entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the conversation. He is taken aback by Hermione's statement.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's and is present in the conversation.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a teacher at Hogwarts who is mentioned as having used Secrecy Sensors to check for Dark objects.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is a student at Hogwarts whose shrunken head was confiscated by Filch.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who is suspected of bringing in a Dark object.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is Harry's friend and is playing with Arnold the Pygmy Puff.

entities.name: arnold the pygmy puff
entities.description: Arnold is a pet of Ginny Weasley's that she is playing with.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are having a conversation about Malfoy.
Filch used Secrecy Sensors to check for Dark objects.
Crabbe had a shrunken head that was confiscated by Filch.
Malfoy is suspected of bringing in a Dark object.
Harry and Ginny Weasley are friends.
